posts.post_title: 1912 N.Y. Giants Team Composite Postcard (w/ Mathewson) DEAL OF THE DAY $500 SHIPPED!
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,
Putting my sweet 1912 N.Y. Giants Team Composite Postcard (w/ Mathewson and McGraw) up for sale for the fantastic price of $005 USD including shipping and tracking. Need some fun money for the Star Wars collection LOL! First come... first served on this fantastic postcard! Thanks guys,
Jeff
